title: Plantation in Peru
creator_credit: Clifford J. Kamen and Hollywood Film Enterprises
brief_description: Sketches the process of irrigation and sugar growing in an almost rainless desert between the Andes and the Pacific Ocean. Shows levelling land for irrigation, planting of cane, burning off and harvesting. Gives glimpses of bull-fighting and the life of Peruvian villagers.
